typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Year as string,
		Month as string,
		DayofMonth as string,
		DayOfWeek as string,
		DepTime as string,
		CRSDepTime as string,
		ArrTime as string,
		CRSArrTime as string,
		UniqueCarrier as string,
		FlightNum as string,
		TailNum as string,
		ActualElapsedTime as string,
		CRSElapsedTime as string,
		AirTime as string,
		ArrDelay as string,
		DepDelay as string,
		Origin as string,
		Dest as string,
		Distance as string,
		TaxiIn as string,
		TaxiOut as string,
		Cancelled as string,
		CancellationCode as string,
		Diverted as string,
		CarrierDelay as string,
		WeatherDelay as string,
		NASDelay as string,
		SecurityDelay as string,
		LateAircraftDelay as string,
		Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
source1 select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
